casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harry Sharod JAMES 514PA11-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 23, 2017 David W. Andrews, Assistant Appellate Defender, for James, Harry Sharod. Sandra Wallace-Smith, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of March 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of March 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 17th day of May 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
